argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | eqmat.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 2 |  | eqmat.b | |- B = ( Base ` A ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) |
| 4 | 1, 3, 2 | #P_matbas2i | |- ( X e. B -> X e. ( ( Base ` R ) ^m ( N X. N ) ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_elmapfn | |- ( X e. ( ( Base ` R ) ^m ( N X. N ) ) -> X Fn ( N X. N ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_syl | |- ( X e. B -> X Fn ( N X. N ) ) |
| 7 | 1, 3, 2 | #P_matbas2i | |- ( Y e. B -> Y e. ( ( Base ` R ) ^m ( N X. N ) ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_elmapfn | |- ( Y e. ( ( Base ` R ) ^m ( N X. N ) ) -> Y Fn ( N X. N ) ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_syl | |- ( Y e. B -> Y Fn ( N X. N ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqfnov2 | |- ( ( X Fn ( N X. N ) /\ Y Fn ( N X. N ) ) -> ( X = Y <-> A. i e. N A. j e. N ( i X j ) = ( i Y j ) ) ) |
| 11 | 6, 9, 10 | #P_syl2an | |- ( ( X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X = Y <-> A. i e. N A. j e. N ( i X j ) = ( i Y j ) ) ) |
